value.title: StarCraft 2: BRILLIANT GAME 1 - MaxPax & ByuN's Non-Stop Aggression! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Brilliant best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2 between ByuN and MaxPax, where both players decide to play as aggressively as possible. In this Terran versus Protoss neither player sits back and macros up, instead we get non-stop action throughout the series. Support my work: https://patreon.com/lowkotv Lowko
